AP: Initialization Check in Initialization Procedure of Base Component
DefValue: Always returns: 'check successful'
CTwoImpl: The Base Component is not available for direct use by application developers. This Adaptation Point is therefore not directly supported by the C2 Implementation but, where required, is supported by components which are derived from the Base Component.

AP: Initialization Action in Initialization Procedure of Base Component
DefValue: Do nothing and return: 'action successful'
CTwoImpl: The Base Component is not available for direct use by application developers. This Adaptation Point is therefore not directly supported by the C2 Implementation but, where required, is supported by components which are derived from the Base Component.

AP: Configuration Check in Reset Procedure of Base Component
DefValue: Always returns: 'check successful'
CTwoImpl: The Base Component is not available for direct use by application developers. This Adaptation Point is therefore not directly supported by the C2 Implementation but, where required, is supported by components which are derived from the Base Component.

AP: Configuration Action in Reset Procedure of Base Component
DefValue: Do nothing and return: 'action successful'
CTwoImpl: The Base Component is not available for direct use by application developers. This Adaptation Point is therefore not directly supported by the C2 Implementation but, where required, is supported by components which are derived from the Base Component.

AP: Shutdown Action of Base Component
DefValue: Do nothing
CTwoImpl: The Base Component is not available for direct use by application developers. This Adaptation Point is therefore not directly supported by the C2 Implementation but, where required, is supported by components which are derived from the Base Component.

AP: Execution Procedure of Base Component
DefValue: Do the same dummy action (return without doing anything) whenever the procedure is executed
CTwoImpl: The Base Component is not available for direct use by application developers. This Adaptation Point is therefore not directly supported by the C2 Implementation but, where required, is supported by components which are derived from the Base Component.

AP: Identifier of Host Application
CTwoImpl: \texttt{\#DEFINE} constant in \texttt{CrFwUserConstants.h}

AP: Range of Service Type, Sub-Type and Discriminants for InCommands and InReports
CTwoImpl: \texttt{\#DEFINE} constants in \texttt{CrFwUserConstants.h}

AP: Application Start-Up Procedure
DefValue: No default provided at framework level
CTwoImpl: Implementation of \texttt{CrFwAppStartUpProc.h}. Only a test stub is provided as default at framework level.

AP: Application Reset Procedure
DefValue: No default provided at framework level
CTwoImpl: Implementation of \texttt{CrFwAppResetProc.h}. Only a test stub is provided as default at framework level.

AP: Application Shutdown Procedure
DefValue: No default provided at framework level
CTwoImpl: Implementation of \texttt{CrFwAppShutdownProc.h}. Only a test stub is provided as default at framework level.

AP: State Machine Embedded in state START\_UP of Application State Machine
DefValue: No state machine embedded in state START\_UP
CTwoImpl: \texttt{\#DEFINE} constant in \texttt{CrFwAppSmUserPar.h}

AP: State Machine Embedded in state NORMAL of Application State Machine
DefValue: No state machine embedded in state NORMAL
CTwoImpl: \texttt{\#DEFINE} constant in \texttt{CrFwAppSmUserPar.h}

AP: State Machine Embedded in state RESET of Application State Machine
DefValue: No state machine embedded in state RESET
CTwoImpl: \texttt{\#DEFINE} constant in \texttt{CrFwAppSmUserPar.h}

AP: State Machine Embedded in state SHUTDOWN of Application State Machine
DefValue: No state machine embedded in state SHUTDOWN
CTwoImpl: \texttt{\#DEFINE} constant in \texttt{CrFwAppSmUserPar.h}

AP: \texttt{Make} Operation to dynamically instantiate a component
DefValue: No default provided at framework level
CTwoImpl: The only components which can be instantiated dynamically are report and command components. Their \texttt{make} operations are implemented in full (see \texttt{CrFwInFactoryMake*} and \texttt{CrFwOutFactoryMakeOutCmp} functions). This adaptation point is therefore closed by the C2 Implementation.

AP: \texttt{Release} Operation to dynamically release a component
DefValue: No default provided at framework level
CTwoImpl: The only components which can be released  dynamically are report and command components. Their \texttt{release} operations are implemented in full (see \texttt{CrFwInFactoryRelease*} and \texttt{CrFwOutFactoryReleaseOutCmp} functions). This adaptation point is therefore closed by the C2 Implementation.

AP: Operations to Set and Get the Values of Command and Report Attributes in a Packet
CTwoImpl: Implementation of \texttt{CrFwPckt.h}. Only a test stub is provided as default at framework level.

AP: Operations to Report Errors Values of Command and Report Attributes in a Packet
CTwoImpl: Implementation of \texttt{CrFwRepErr.h}. Only a test stub is provided as default at framework level.

AP: OutFactory Capacity
CTwoImpl: \texttt{\#DEFINE} constant in \texttt{CrFwOutFactoryUserPar.h} defines maximum number of OutComponents which can be allocated by the factory.

AP: OutComponent Kinds
CTwoImpl: \texttt{\#DEFINE} constants in \texttt{CrFwOutFactoryUserPar.h} define the kinds of OutComponents supported by the application. An OutComponent kind is defined through its service type, command or report sub-type, and discriminant value. For each supported OutComponent kind, function pointers are defined implementing the OutComponent checks and actions.

AP: InFactory Capacity for InReports
CTwoImpl: \texttt{\#DEFINE} constant in \texttt{CrFwInFactoryUserPar.h} defines maximum number of InReports which can be allocated by the factory.

AP: InFactory Capacity for InCommands
CTwoImpl: \texttt{\#DEFINE} constant in \texttt{CrFwInFactoryUserPar.h} defines maximum number of InCommands which can be allocated by the factory.

AP: InReport Kinds
CTwoImpl: \texttt{\#DEFINE} constants in \texttt{CrFwInFactoryUserPar.h} define the kinds of InReports supported by the application. An InReport kind is defined through its service type, command or report sub-type, and discriminant value. For each supported InReport kind, function pointers are defined implementing the InReport checks and actions.

AP: InCommand Kinds
CTwoImpl: \texttt{\#DEFINE} constants in \texttt{CrFwInFactoryUserPar.h} define the kinds of InCommands supported by the application. An InCommand kind is defined through its service type, command or report sub-type, and discriminant value. For each supported InCommand kind, function pointers are defined implementing the InCommand checks and actions.

AP: Number of OutStreams in the Application
CTwoImpl: \texttt{\#DEFINE} constant in \texttt{CrFwOutStreamUserPar.h}

AP: Packet Queue Size for OutStream
DefValue: No value defined at framework level
CTwoImpl: \texttt{\#DEFINE} constant (one for each OutStream in the application) in \texttt{CrFwOutStreamUserPar.h}

AP: Destination associated to OutStream
CTwoImpl: \texttt{\#DEFINE} constant (one for each OutStream in the application) in \texttt{CrFwOutStreamUserPar.h}

AP: Initialization Check in Initialization Procedure of OutStream
DefValue: Returns 'check successful' if the size of the Packet Queue has been set to a positive integer
CTwoImpl: Function pointers (one for each OutStream in the application) in \texttt{CrFwOutStreamUserPar.h}. Default implementation is provided in \texttt{CrFwOutStream.h}..

AP: Initialization Action in Initialization Procedure of OutStream
DefValue: Allocate resources for Packet Queue and return 'Action Successful' iff the allocation succeeds
CTwoImpl: Function pointers (one for each OutStream in the application) in \texttt{CrFwOutStreamUserPar.h}. Default implementation is provided in \texttt{CrFwOutStream.h}..

AP: Configuration Check in Initialization Procedure of OutStream
DefValue: Same value as in Base Component
CTwoImpl: Function pointers (one for each OutStream in the application) in \texttt{CrFwOutStreamUserPar.h}. Default implementation is provided in \texttt{CrFwOutStream.h}..

AP: Configuration Action in Reset Procedure of OutStream
DefValue: Reset the Packet Queue and return 'Action Successful'
CTwoImpl: Function pointers (one for each OutStream in the application) in \texttt{CrFwOutStreamUserPar.h}. Default implementation is provided in \texttt{CrFwOutStream.h}..

AP: Shutdown Action of OutStream
DefValue: Reset the Packet Queue
CTwoImpl: Function pointers (one for each OutStream in the application) in \texttt{CrFwOutStreamUserPar.h}. Default implementation is provided in \texttt{CrFwOutStream.h}..

AP: Execution Procedure of OutStream (closes BAS-6)
DefValue: Same value as in Base Component
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed at framework level.

AP: Packet Hand-Over Operation of OutStream
DefValue: No value defined at framework level
CTwoImpl: Function pointers (one for each OutStream in the application) in \texttt{CrFwOutStreamUserPar.h}. Only a test stub is provided as default at framework level.

AP: Operation to set Sequence Counter in Outgoing Packets
DefValue: No value defined at framework level
CTwoImpl: Implemented by Adaptation Point C2-PCK-1.

AP: Operation to Report Packet Queue Full
DefValue: Generate OUTSTREAM\_PQ\_FULL Error Report
CTwoImpl: Implemented by Adaptation Point C2-ERR-1.

AP: Operation to Compute and Set a Packet’s CRC
DefValue: Set CRC to 0xFFFF
CTwoImpl: Implementation of function \texttt{CrFwComputeAndSetCrc} in interface \texttt{CrFwPckt.h}. Only a test stub is provided by default at framework level.

AP: Number of InStreams in the Application
CTwoImpl: \texttt{\#DEFINE} constant in \texttt{CrFwInStreamUserPar.h}

AP: Size of the Packet Queue in InStream
DefValue: Default size is 1
CTwoImpl: \texttt{\#DEFINE} constant (one for each InStream in the application) in \texttt{CrFwInStreamUserPar.h}

AP: Source associated to InStream
CTwoImpl: \texttt{\#DEFINE} constant (one for each InStream in the application) in \texttt{CrFwInStreamUserPar.h}

AP: Initialization Check in Initialization Procedure of InStream
DefValue: Returns 'check successful' if the size of the Packet Queue has been set to a positive integer
CTwoImpl: Function pointers (one for each InStream in the application) in \texttt{CrFwInStreamUserPar.h}. Default implementation is provided in \texttt{CrFwInStream.h}.

AP: Initialization Action in Initialization Procedure of InStream
DefValue: Allocate resources for Packet Queue and return 'Action Successful' iff the allocation succeeds
CTwoImpl: Function pointers (one for each InStream in the application) in \texttt{CrFwInStreamUserPar.h}. Default implementation is provided in \texttt{CrFwInStream.h}.

AP: Configuration Action in Reset Procedure of InStream
DefValue: Reset the Packet Queue and return 'Action Successful'
CTwoImpl: Function pointers (one for each InStream in the application) in \texttt{CrFwInStreamUserPar.h}. Default implementation is provided in \texttt{CrFwInStream.h}.

AP: Shutdown Action of InStream
DefValue: Reset the Packet Queue
CTwoImpl: Function pointers (one for each InStream in the application) in \texttt{CrFwInStreamUserPar.h}. Default implementation is provided in \texttt{CrFwInStream.h}.

AP: Execution Procedure of InStream (closes BAS-6)
DefValue: Same value as in Base Component
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed at framework level.

AP: Operation to Get Packet Source from Incoming Packet
DefValue: No value defined at framework level
CTwoImpl: Implemented by Adaptation Point C2-PCK-1.

AP: Operation to Get Packet Sequence Counter from Incoming Packet
DefValue: No value defined at framework level
CTwoImpl: Implemented by Adaptation Point C2-PCK-1.

AP: Operation to Report Sequence Counter Error
DefValue: Generate INSTREAM\_SC\_ERR Error Report with expected and actual sequence counter values
CTwoImpl: Implemented by Adaptation Point C2-ERR-1.

AP: Operation to Report Packet Queue Full
DefValue: Generate INSTREAM\_PQ\_FULL Error Report
CTwoImpl: Implemented by Adaptation Point C2-ERR-1.

AP: Packet Collect Operation for InStream
DefValue: No default defined at framework level
CTwoImpl: Function pointers (one for each InStream in the application) in \texttt{CrFwInStreamUserPar.h}. Only a test stub is provided as default at framework level.

AP: Packet Available Check Operation for InStream
DefValue: No default defined at framework level
CTwoImpl: Function pointers (one for each InStream in the application) in \texttt{CrFwInStreamUserPar.h}. Only a test stub is provided as default at framework level.

AP: Initialization Check in Initialization Procedure of OutStreamRegistry
DefValue: Same value as in Base Component
CTwoImpl: In the C2 Implementation, the OutStreamRegistry is not implemented as a separate component (it is merged with the OutStream). This adaptation point is closed in the C2 Implementation.

AP: Initialization Action in Initialization Procedure of OutStreamRegistry
DefValue: Same value as in Base Component
CTwoImpl: In the C2 Implementation, the OutStreamRegistry is not implemented as a separate component (it is merged with the OutStream). This adaptation point is closed in the C2 Implementation.

AP: Configuration Check in  Reset Procedure of OutStreamRegistry
DefValue: Returns 'check successful' if the information to set up the link between the packet destinations and the OutStreams is available.
CTwoImpl: In the C2 Implementation, the OutStreamRegistry is not implemented as a separate component (it is merged with the OutStream). This adaptation point is closed in the C2 Implementation.

AP: Configuration Action in Reset Procedure of OutStreamRegistry
DefValue: Set up and configure the link between the packet destinations and the OutStreams.
CTwoImpl: In the C2 Implementation, the OutStreamRegistry is not implemented as a separate component (it is merged with the OutStream). This adaptation point is closed in the C2 Implementation.

AP: Shutdown Action  of OutStreamRegistry (closes BAS-5)
DefValue: Same value as in Base Component
CTwoImpl: In the C2 Implementation, the OutStreamRegistry is not implemented as a separate component (it is merged with the OutStream). This adaptation point is closed in the C2 Implementation.

AP: Execution Procedure of OutStreamRegistry (closes BAS-6)
DefValue: Same value as in Base Component
CTwoImpl: In the C2 Implementation, the OutStreamRegistry is not implemented as a separate component (it is merged with the OutStream). This adaptation point is closed in the C2 Implementation.

AP: Get OutStream Operation of OutStreamRegistry
DefValue: No default provided at framework level
CTwoImpl: \texttt{\#DEFINE} constants (one for each OutStream in the application) in \texttt{CrFwOutStreamUserPar.h} define the destination associated to each OutStream.

AP: Initialization Check in Initialization Procedure of OutComponent
DefValue: Same value as in Base Component
CTwoImpl: OutComponents are provided by the OutFactory in the CONFIGURED state and cannot therefore be initialized and configured by the user. This adaptation point is closed in the C2 Implementation.

AP: Initialization Action in Initialization Procedure of OutComponent
DefValue: Same value as in Base Component
CTwoImpl: OutComponents are provided by the OutFactory in the CONFIGURED state and cannot therefore be initialized and configured by the user. This adaptation point is closed in the C2 Implementation.

AP: Configuration Check in Reset Procedure of OutComponent
DefValue: Same value as in Base Component
CTwoImpl: OutComponents are provided by the OutFactory in the CONFIGURED state and cannot therefore be initialized and configured by the user. This adaptation point is closed in the C2 Implementation.

AP: Configuration Action in Reset Procedure of OutComponent
DefValue: Same value as in Base Component
CTwoImpl: OutComponents are provided by the OutFactory in the CONFIGURED state and cannot therefore be initialized and configured by the user. This adaptation point is closed in the C2 Implementation.

AP: Shutdown Action in Base Component of OutComponent
DefValue: Same value as in Base Component
CTwoImpl: OutComponents are provided by the OutFactory in the CONFIGURED state and are not intended to be ever shut down. This adaptation point is closed in the C2 Implementation.

AP: Execution Procedure of OutComponent (closes BAS-6)
DefValue: Same value as in Base Component
CTwoImpl: The OutComponents are not intended to be ever executed. This adaptation point is closed in the C2 Implementation.

AP: Service Type Attribute of OutComponent
DefValue: No default provided at framework level
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is implemented by adaptation point OFA-2.

AP: Command/Report Sub-Type Attribute of OutComponent
DefValue: No default provided at framework level
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is implemented by adaptation point OFA-2.

AP: Destination Attribute of OutComponent
DefValue: No default provided at framework level
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is implemented by adaptation point OFA-2.

AP: Acknowledge Level Attribute of OutComponent
DefValue: Default value is: 'no acknowledge required' (only relevant for OutCommands)
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is implemented by adaptation point C2-PCK-1.

AP: Discriminant Attribute of OutComponent
DefValue: Default value is: 'no discriminant'
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is implemented by adaptation point OFA-2.

AP: Parameter Attribute of OutComponent
DefValue: Default value is: 'no parameters'
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is implemented indirectly: applications must extend OutComponents and must define the range of parameters for each OutComponent and the operations to set their values.

AP: Enable Check Operation of OutComponent
DefValue: Query the OutRegistry for the enable status of the command or report encapsulated in the OutComponent and set value of isEnable accordingly
CTwoImpl: \texttt{\#DEFINE} constants (one for each kind of OutComponent in the application) in \texttt{CrFwOutFactoryUserPar.h} define the pointer to the function implementing the operation. A default is provided a framework level.

AP: Ready Check Operation of OutComponent
DefValue: Set value of isReady flag to true
CTwoImpl: \texttt{\#DEFINE} constants (one for each kind of OutComponent in the application) in \texttt{CrFwOutFactoryUserPar.h} define the pointer to the function implementing the operation. A default is provided a framework level.

AP: Repeat Check Operation of OutComponent
DefValue: Return “No Repeat”
CTwoImpl: \texttt{\#DEFINE} constants (one for each kind of OutComponent in the application) in \texttt{CrFwOutFactoryUserPar.h} define the pointer to the function implementing the operation. A default is provided a framework level.

AP: Update Action of OutComponent
DefValue: Set Time Stamp of OutComponent to current time
CTwoImpl: \texttt{\#DEFINE} constants (one for each kind of OutComponent in the application) in \texttt{CrFwOutFactoryUserPar.h} define the pointer to the function implementing the operation. A default is provided a framework level.

AP: Serialize Operation of OutComponent
DefValue: No default defined at framework level
CTwoImpl: \texttt{\#DEFINE} constants (one for each kind of OutComponent in the application) in \texttt{CrFwOutFactoryUserPar.h} define the pointer to the function implementing the operation. A default is provided a framework level.

AP: Operation to Report Invalid Destination of an OutComponent
DefValue: Generate SNDPCKT\_INV\_DEST Error Report with invalid destination as a parameter
CTwoImpl: Implemented by Adaptation Point C2-ERR-1.

AP: Initialization Check in Initialization Procedure of OutLoader
DefValue: Returns 'check successful' if the size of the LOM (List of OutManagers) has been set to a positive integer value.
CTwoImpl: Function pointer in \texttt{CrFwOutLoaderUserPar.h}. Default implementation which always returns 'check successful' is provided in \texttt{CrFwOutLoader.h}.

AP: Initialization Action in Initialization Procedure  of OutLoader
DefValue: Allocate resources for LOM and return 'Action Successful' iff the allocation succeeds
CTwoImpl: Function pointer in \texttt{CrFwOutLoaderUserPar.h}. Default implementation which takes no action is provided in \texttt{CrFwOutLoader.h}.

AP: Configuration Check in Reset Procedure of OutLoader
DefValue: Returns 'check successful' iff all the information is available to update (or initialize) the value of the LOM.
CTwoImpl: Function pointer in \texttt{CrFwOutLoaderUserPar.h}. Default implementation which always returns 'check successful' is provided in \texttt{CrFwOutLoader.h}.

AP: Configuration Action in Reset Procedure of OutLoader
DefValue: Update (or initialize) the LOM and return 'Action Successful'
CTwoImpl: Function pointer in \texttt{CrFwOutLoaderUserPar.h}. Default implementation which takes no action is provided in \texttt{CrFwOutLoader.h}.

AP: Shutdown Action of OutLoader
DefValue: Same as in Base Component.
CTwoImpl: Function pointer in \texttt{CrFwOutLoaderUserPar.h}. Default implementation which takes no action is provided in \texttt{CrFwOutLoader.h}.

AP: Execution Procedure of OutLoader (closes BAS-6)
DefValue: Same as in Base Component.
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed at framework level.

AP: OutManager Selection Operation
DefValue: Select the first OutManager in the LOM
CTwoImpl: Function pointer in \texttt{CrFwOutLoaderUserPar.h}. Default implementation which always returns the first OutManager in the LOM is provided in \texttt{CrFwOutLoader.h}.

AP: OutManager Activation Operation
DefValue: Do nothing
CTwoImpl: Function pointer in \texttt{CrFwOutLoaderUserPar.h}. Default implementation which takes no action is provided in \texttt{CrFwOutLoader.h}.

AP: Operation to set Set Time-Stamp in Outgoing Packets
DefValue: No value defined at framework level
CTwoImpl: Implemented by Adaptation Point C2-PCK-1.

AP: Number of OutManagers in Application
CTwoImpl: \texttt{\#DEFINE} constants in \texttt{CrFwOutManagerUserPar.h}

AP: Size of POCL of OutManager
DefValue: Default size is 1.
CTwoImpl: \texttt{\#DEFINE} constants (one for each OutManager) in \texttt{CrFwOutManagerUserPar.h}

AP: Initialization Check in Initialization Procedure of OutManager (closes BAS-1)
DefValue: Returns 'check successful' if the size of the POCL has been set to a positive integer value.
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed at framework level.

AP: Initialization Action in Initialization Procedure of OutManager (closes BAS-2)
DefValue: Allocate resources for POCL and return 'Action Successful' iff the allocation succeeds
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed at framework level.

AP: Configuration Check in Reset Procedure of OutManager (closes BAS-3)
DefValue: Same as in Base Component
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed at framework level.

AP: Configuration Action in Reset Procedure  (closes BAS-4)
DefValue: Release all OutComponents in the POCL; reset the POCL; reset the counter of successfully loaded OutComponents; and return 'Action Successful'
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed at framework level.

AP: Shutdown Action in Base Component of OutManager (closes BAS-5)
DefValue: Release all OutComponents in the POCL; reset the POCL
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed at framework level.

AP: Execution Procedure in Base Component of OutManager (closes BAS-6)
DefValue: Implemented as procedure of Manager Execution Procedure
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed at framework level.

AP: Operation to Report POCL of OutManager Full
DefValue: Generate OUTMANAGER\_POCL\_FULL Error Report
CTwoImpl: Implemented by Adaptation Point C2-ERR-1.

AP: Maximum Number of Trackable Commands/Reports for OutRegistry
DefValue: Default value is 1.
CTwoImpl: \texttt{\#DEFINE} constant in \texttt{CrFwOutRegistryUserPar.h} defines types, sub-types and range of discriminant values supported by application.

AP: Number of Service Types/Sub-Types supported by Application
CTwoImpl: \texttt{\#DEFINE} constant in \texttt{CrFwOutRegistryUserPar.h} defines types, sub-types and range of discriminant values supported by application.

AP: Range of Services supported by Application
CTwoImpl: \texttt{\#DEFINE} constant in \texttt{CrFwOutRegistryUserPar.h} defines types, sub-types and range of discriminant values supported by application.

AP: Initialization Check in Initialization Procedure of OutRegistry (closes BAS-1)
DefValue: Returns 'check successful' if the maximum number of trackable commands/reports has been set to a positive integer value.
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed at framework level.

AP: Initialization Action in Initialization Procedure of OutRegistry (closes BAS-2)
DefValue: Allocate the resources for tracking the commands and reports and returns: 'action successful' if the allocation succeeds or 'action failed' if the allocation fails.
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed at framework level.

AP: Configuration Check in Reset Procedure of OutRegistry (closes BAS-3)
DefValue: Same value as in Base Component
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed at framework level.

AP: Configuration Action in Reset Procedure of OutRegistry (closes BAS-4)
DefValue: Set the enable state for all kinds of commands and reports to: 'enabled'; clear all information about tracked commands and reports; and return: 'action successful'.
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed at framework level.

AP: Shutdown Action of OutRegistry (closes BAS-5)
DefValue: Set the enable state for all kinds of commands and reports to: 'enabled'; clear all information about tracked commands and reports.
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed at framework level.

AP: Execution Procedure of OutRegistry (closes BAS-6)
DefValue: Same value as in Base Component
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed at framework level.

AP: Operations to Report the Outcome of the Processing and Execution of an Incoming Command
CTwoImpl: Implementation of \texttt{CrFwRepInCmdOutcome.h}. Only a test stub is provided as default at framework level.

AP: Initialization Check in Initialization Procedure of InLoader (closes BAS-1)
DefValue: Return “check successful' iff the sizes of the LIM is a positive integer
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed at framework level.

AP: Initialization Action in Initialization Procedure of InLoader (closes BAS-2)
DefValue: Allocate resources for the LIM and return “Action Successful' iff the allocation succeeds
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed at framework level.

AP: Configuration Check in Reset Procedure of InLoader (closes BAS-3)
DefValue: Returns “check successful' if: (a) the information to update (or initialize) the content of the LIM is valid; and (b) the information to re-route packets is valid.
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed at framework level.

AP: Configuration Action in Reset Procedure of InLoader (closes BAS-4)
DefValue: (a) update (or initialize) content of LIM; and (b) update (or initialize) packet re-routing information.
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed at framework level.

AP: Shutdown Action of InLoader (closes BAS-5)
DefValue: Same as in Base Component.
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed at framework level.

AP: Execution Procedure of InLoader (closes BAS-6)
DefValue: Implemented as InLoader Execution Procedure.
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed at framework level.

AP: Size of List of InManagers in InLoader
DefValue: Default size is 2.
CTwoImpl: The InLoader of the C2 Implementation does not explicitly define a List of InManager. This Adaptation Point is subsumed in the Adaptation Point for the selection of InManager (C2-ILD-TBD)

AP: Content of List of InManagers in InLoader
DefValue: No default provided at framework level.
CTwoImpl: The InLoader of the C2 Implementation does not explicitly define a List of InManager. It only defines the function to return the InManager where the InReport or InCommand must be loaded (see C2-ILD-2).

AP: Operation to Determine Re-Routing Destination of Packets
DefValue: Re0routing destination is set to the destination of the incoming packet.
CTwoImpl: Function pointer in \texttt{CrFwInLoaderUserPar.h}. Default implementation is provided \texttt{CrFwInLoader.h}.

AP: Operation to Get Packet Destination
DefValue: No default provided at framework level.
CTwoImpl: Implemented by Adaptation Point C2-PCK-1.

AP: Operation to Check Packet Destination Validity
DefValue: Always returns “destination is valid'.
CTwoImpl: The check of the destination validity is performed by the function which returns the re-routing destination.

AP: Operation to Report Packet Destination Invalid
DefValue: Generate error report INLOADER\_INV\_DEST with the destination identifier as a parameter
CTwoImpl: Implemented by Adaptation Point C2-ERR-1.

AP: Operation to Get Packet Type
DefValue: No default provided at framework level
CTwoImpl: Implemented by Adaptation Point C2-PCK-1.

AP: Operation to Report Acceptance Failure
DefValue: For InCommands: generate command acknowledge report CMD\_ACK\_ACC\_FAIL with command's identifier and with identifier of reason of failure as parameters.. For InReports: generate error report INLOADER\_ACC\_FAIL with report's identifier and with identifier of reason of acceptance failure as parameters.
CTwoImpl: Implemented by Adaptation Point C2-ACK-1.

AP: Operation to Report Acceptance Success
DefValue: Generate command acknowledge report CMD\_ACK\_ACC\_SUCC with command's identifier as parameter.
CTwoImpl: Implemented by Adaptation Point C2-ACK-1.

AP: Operation to Deserialize Packet
DefValue: No default provided at framework level.
CTwoImpl: Packets are not deserialized in the C2 Implementation. Instead, the packet itself is attached to the component encapsulating the incoming report or command. This adaptation point is closed in the C2 Implementation.

AP: Operation to Select InManager where Incoming Report or Command is Loaded
DefValue: For InCommands, select first InManager in LIM; for InReport, select second InManager in LIM.
CTwoImpl: Function pointer in \texttt{CrFwInLoaderUserPar.h}. Default implementation is provided \texttt{CrFwInLoader.h}.

AP: Operation to Check Packet Type Validity
DefValue: No default provided at framework level
CTwoImpl: This check is implemented in function \textit{CrFwInFactoryMakeInCmd} for incoming command and in function \textit{CrFwInFactoryMakeInRep} for incoming report. These functions check that the type is supported by the application.

AP: Initialization Check in Initialization Procedure of InCommand
DefValue: Returns “check successful' if information for initializing InCommand using data in incoming packet is valid
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed in the C2 Implementation because InCommands are provided by the InFactory in the CONFIGURED state  (but a validity check is provided in C2-ICM-1 to implement the acceptance check).

AP: Initialization Action in Initialization Procedure of InCommand
DefValue: Use information in incoming packet to initialize InCommand and return “action successful'
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed in the C2 Implementation because InCommands are provided by the InFactory in the CONFIGURED state (but a validity check is provided in C2-ICM-1 to implement the acceptance check).

AP: Configuration Check in Reset Procedure of InCommand
DefValue: Returns “check successful' if information carried by packet is valid
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed in the C2 Implementation because InCommands are provided by the InFactory in the CONFIGURED state (but a validity check is provided in C2-ICM-1 to implement the acceptance check).

AP: Configuration Action in Reset Procedure of InCommand
DefValue: Use information in incoming packet to configure InCommand and return “action successful'
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed in the C2 Implementation because InCommands are provided by the InFactory in the CONFIGURED state (but a validity check is provided in C2-ICM-1 to implement the acceptance check).

AP: Validity Check for InCommand
CTwoImpl: Function pointer in \texttt{CrFwInFactoryUserPar.h}. Default implementation which verifies correctness of CRC is provided by function \texttt{CrFwInCmdDefValidityCheck}.

AP: Shutdown Action of InCommand (closes BAS-5)
DefValue: Same value as in Base Component
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed at framework level.

AP: Execution Procedure of InCommand (closes BAS-6)
DefValue: Same value as in Base Component
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed at framework level.

AP: Ready Check of InCommand
DefValue: Return “command is ready'
CTwoImpl: Function pointer in \texttt{CrFwInFactoryUserPar.h}. Default implementation is provided by function \texttt{CrFwSmCheckAlwaysTrue}.

AP: Start Action of InCommand
DefValue: Set action outcome to “success'
CTwoImpl: Function pointer in \texttt{CrFwInFactoryUserPar.h}. Default implementation is provided by function \texttt{CrFwSmEmptyAction}.

AP: Progress Action of InCommand
DefValue: Set action outcome to “completed'
CTwoImpl: Function pointer in \texttt{CrFwInFactoryUserPar.h}. Default implementation is provided by function \texttt{CrFwSmEmptyAction}.

AP: Termination Action of InCommand
DefValue: Set action outcome to “success'
CTwoImpl: Function pointer in \texttt{CrFwInFactoryUserPar.h}. Default implementation is provided by function \texttt{CrFwSmEmptyAction}.

AP: Abort Action of InCommand
DefValue: Do nothing
CTwoImpl: Function pointer in \texttt{CrFwInFactoryUserPar.h}. Default implementation is provided by function \texttt{CrFwSmEmptyAction}.

AP: Operation to Report Start Failed for InCommand
DefValue: Generate command acknowledge report CMD\_ACK\_STR\_FAIL with command's identifier and with identifier of reason of failure as parameters.
CTwoImpl: Implemented by Adaptation Point C2-ACK-1.

AP: Operation to Report Start Successful for InCommand
DefValue: Generate command acknowledge report CMD\_ACK\_STR\_SUCC with command's identifier as parameter.
CTwoImpl: Implemented by Adaptation Point C2-ACK-1.

AP: Operation to Report Progress Failed for InCommand
DefValue: Generate command acknowledge report CMD\_ACK\_PRG\_FAIL with command's identifier, progress step and with identifier of reason of failure as parameters.
CTwoImpl: Implemented by Adaptation Point C2-ACK-1.

AP: Operation to Report Progress Successful for InCommand
DefValue: Generate command acknowledge report CMD\_ACK\_PRG\_SUCC with command's identifier and progress step as parameters.
CTwoImpl: Implemented by Adaptation Point C2-ACK-1.

AP: Operation to Report Termination Failed for InCommand
DefValue: Generate command acknowledge report CMD\_ACK\_TRM\_FAIL with command's identifier and with identifier of reason of failure as parameters.
CTwoImpl: Implemented by Adaptation Point C2-ACK-1.

AP: Operation to Report Report Termination Successful for InCommand
DefValue: Generate command acknowledge report CMD\_ACK\_TRM\_FAIL with command's identifier as parameter.
CTwoImpl: Implemented by Adaptation Point C2-ACK-1.

AP: Service Type Attribute of InCommand
DefValue: No default provided at framework level
CTwoImpl: Implemented by Adaptation Point C2-IFA-4.

AP: Command Sub-Type Attribute of InCommand
DefValue: No default provided at framework level
CTwoImpl: Implemented by Adaptation Point C2-IFA-4.

AP: Discriminant Attribute of InCommand
DefValue: Default value is: “no discriminant'
CTwoImpl: Implemented by Adaptation Point C2-IFA-4.

AP: Parameter Attributes of InCommand
DefValue: Default value is: “no parameters'
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is implemented indirectly: applications must extend InCommands and must define the range of parameters for each kind of InCommand and the operations to get their values.

AP: Initialization Check in Initialization Procedure of InReport
DefValue: Returns “check successful' if information for initializing InReport using data in incoming packet is valid
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed by the C2 Implementation because InReports are provided by the InFactory in the CONFIGURED state (but a validity check is provided in C2-ICM-1 to implement the acceptance check).

AP: Initialization Action in Initialization Procedure of InReport
DefValue: Use information in incoming packet to initialize InReport and return “action successful'
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed by the C2 Implementation because InReports are provided by the InFactory in the CONFIGURED state (but a validity check is provided in C2-ICM-1 to implement the acceptance check).

AP: Configuration Check in Reset Procedure of InReport
DefValue: Returns “check successful' if information for configuring InReport using data in incoming packet is valid
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed by the C2 Implementation because InReports are provided by the InFactory in the CONFIGURED state (but a validity check is provided in C2-ICM-1 to implement the acceptance check).

AP: Configuration Action in Reset Procedure of InReport
DefValue: Use information in incoming packet to configure InReport and return “action successful'
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed by the C2 Implementation because InReports are provided by the InFactory in the CONFIGURED state (but a validity check is provided in C2-ICM-1 to implement the acceptance check).

AP: Validity Check for InReport
CTwoImpl: Function pointer in \texttt{CrFwInFactoryUserPar.h}. Default implementation which verifies correctness of CRC is provided by function \texttt{CrFwInRepDefValidityCheck}.

AP: Shutdown Action of InReport (closes BAS-5)
DefValue: Same value as in Base Component
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed at framework level.

AP: Execution Procedure of InReport (closes BAS-6)
DefValue: Same value as in Base Component
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed at framework level.

AP: Update Action of InReport
DefValue: Do nothing
CTwoImpl: Function pointer in \texttt{CrFwInFactoryUserPar.h}. Default implementation is provided at framework level.

AP: Service Type Attribute of InReport
DefValue: No default provided at framework level
CTwoImpl: Implemented by Adaptation Point C2-IFA-3.

AP: Sub-Type Attribute of InReport
DefValue: No default provided at framework level
CTwoImpl: Implemented by Adaptation Point C2-IFA-3.

AP: Discriminant Attribute of InReport
DefValue: Default value is: “no discriminant'
CTwoImpl: Implemented by Adaptation Point C2-IFA-3.

AP: Parameter Attribute of InReport
DefValue: Default value is: “no parameters'
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is implemented indirectly: applications must extend InCommands and must define the range of parameters for each kind of InCommand and the operations to get their values.

AP: Number of InManagers in Application
CTwoImpl: \texttt{\#DEFINE} constants in \texttt{CrFwInManagerUserPar.h}

AP: Size of PCRL of InManager
DefValue: Default size is 1.
CTwoImpl: \texttt{\#DEFINE} constants (one for each InManager) in \texttt{CrFwInManagerUserPar.h}

AP: Initialization Check in Initialization Procedure of InManager (closes BAS-1)
DefValue: Returns “check successful' if the size of the PCRL has been set to a positive integer value.
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed at framework level.

AP: Initialization Action in Initialization Procedure of InManager (closes BAS-2)
DefValue: Allocate resources for PCRL and return “Action Successful' iff the allocation succeeds
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed at framework level.

AP: Configuration Check in Reset Procedure of InManager (closes BAS-3)
DefValue: Same as in Base Component
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed at framework level.

AP: Configuration Action in Reset Procedure of InManager (closes BAS-4)
DefValue: Release all InCommands and InReports in the PCRL; reset the counter of successfully loaded InCommands and InReports; reset the PCRL; and return “Action Successful'
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed at framework level.

AP: Shutdown Action of InManager (closes BAS-5)
DefValue: Release all InCommands and InReports in the PCRL; reset the PCRL;
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed at framework level.

AP: Execution Procedure of InManager (closes BAS-6)
DefValue: Implemented as InManager Execution Procedure.
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed at framework level.

AP: Operation to Report PCRL of InManager Full
DefValue: Generate INMANAGER\_PCRL\_FULL Error Report
CTwoImpl: Implemented by Adaptation Point C2-ERR-1.

AP: Maximum Number of Trackable InCommands/InReports in InRegistry
DefValue: Default value is 1.
CTwoImpl: \texttt{\#DEFINE} constant in \texttt{CrFwInRegistryUserPar.h}

AP: Initialization Check in Initialization Procedure of InRegistry (closes BAS-1)
DefValue: Returns “check successful' if the maximum number of trackable InCommands/InReports has been set to a positive integer value.
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed at framework level.

AP: Initialization Action in Initialization Procedure of InRegistry (closes BAS-2)
DefValue: Allocate the resources for tracking the commands and reports and returns: “action successful' if the allocation succeeds or “action failed' if the allocation fails.
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed at framework level.

AP: Configuration Check in Reset Procedure of InRegistry (closes BAS-3)
DefValue: Same value as in Base Component
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed at framework level.

AP: Configuration Action in Reset Procedure  (closes BAS-4)
DefValue: Clear all information about tracked InCommands and InReports; return: “action successful'.
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed at framework level.

AP: Shutdown Action of InRegistry (closes BAS-5)
DefValue: Clear all information about tracked InCommands and InReports.
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed at framework level.

AP: Execution Procedure of InRegistry (closes BAS-6)
DefValue: Same value as in Base Component
CTwoImpl: This Adaptation Point is closed at framework level.

CTwoImpl: Implementation of \texttt{CrFwTime.h}. Only a test stub is provided as default at framework level.
